title: hi my names owen i wont good mates
body:
So iv been playing thru my friends list and deleting all the players that are toxic dicks ass holes so on. 
But any way I'm looking for players that if some dick ses mid or feed despite the fact that you got mid will say kk il go top, I'm looking for  players that dont care if he/she wins or loses ranked but will try there hardest to win, I'm looking for a friend but it is hard for I am like  {{champion:32}} and no one likes a nice player

replies.body:
I'm not online often, but feel free to add me :D
You've taken a lot of flak over the past few years from the boards, and although I did find some of your statements questionable, I did feel sorry for you. I can't say that I'll be a good friend, but hey, it's up to you man.

ARE YOU UNDER THE AGE OF 13?

Because it really does seem like so.

Anyways,

> So iv been playing thru my friends list and deleting all the players that are toxic dicks ass holes so on.

Then why'd you add them.

Usually i'd join a premade if
1) I know at least 1 person in the premade
2) Skype/TS3
3) IRL friend/acquaintance
cos I was a toxic shit head once lol and no I'm 17
